Description.Text: Casa Leonori Assisi is a quiet 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation in Santa Maria degli Angeli, southwest Assisi. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, a traditional onsite restaurant and a good location close to transport links. Assisi is the capital of Umbria, central Italy. It is a medieval hill town famous for being the birthplace of St. Francis of Assisi and has been the site of religious pilgrimages for centuries. The town retains its peace and tranquillity amongst ancient architecture, narrow cobblestone pathways, beautiful piazzas and relaxed street cafes. Places of interest include the Basilica di San Francesco, the Basilica di Santa Chiara and the mountainside hermitage Eremo della Carceri. The hotel is housed in a low-rise, modern brick and glass building set within its own private grounds and front courtyard. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Classic rooms are bright, modern and cosy. They are decorated in warm tones and have large windows. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, a telephone and a work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub and a shower. The hotel restaurant offers traditional Umbrian cuisine and homemade dishes in a bright and friendly setting. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Free parking is possible onsite.
